summary: This is a Municipal Credit Union ACH Stop Payment Request/Cancellation form, dated August 23, 2019, requesting a stop payment on all ACH payments from Capital One to an account. The form is signed by a member and processed by MCU employee Dany Dominguez.

persons.name: Dany Dominguez
persons.context: MCU employee who received and processed the stop payment request form.

events.title: Stop Payment Request Filed
events.description: A stop payment request is filed with Municipal Credit Union to stop all ACH payments from Capital One to a specified account.

locations: Church Street Station P.O. Box 3205 - New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A stop payment request was filed on August 23, 2019, to halt all ACH payments from Capital One to a specific account.
The request was processed by MCU employee Dany Dominguez.
The form indicates the account holder's address is in Brooklyn, NY 11207-1012.
The stop payment was set to expire on September 6, 2019, if not confirmed in writing.
The document is a standard financial form with no direct mention of Epstein, victims, or illegal activities.
